Name: First Kestrel Grenadiers
Details: Formed from House Cunningham's personal guards, the First Kestrel Grenadiers are now an independent Regimental Combat Team with the Federated Suns and later the Federated Commonwealth. The unit consists of 3 reinforced Mech Battalions, 2 Regiments of armour and 2 more of mechanized infantry.  The Kestrel Grenadiers are rated as Elite.
